game.name: Colorado Rail Game
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience Colorado by rail in this relaxing travel simulation. Manage your inventory and hunger as you journey across the plains, collecting rare souvenirs and local lore. Meet a cast of diverse passengers to uncover the authentic history and culture of the Centennial State.
